item.title: MIND TECHNOLOGY INC 10-K
item.description: MIND TECHNOLOGY INC, which is in the Search, Detection, Navigation, Guidance, Aeronautical Sys [3812] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 29, 2022 had 24700 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: stock - 257 instances 2022 - 248 instances company - 237 instances operations - 236 instances financial - 206 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
